thread.title: Gunmen kidnap 16 Turkish workers in Baghdad
thread.title_full: Gunmen kidnap 16 Turkish workers in Baghdad | News24

author: news24.com
title: Gunmen kidnap 16 Turkish workers in Baghdad
text:
Baghdad - Gunmen wearing army uniforms on Wednesday abducted 16 Turkish building workers and an Iraqi colleague in Baghdad, police said.
The men were kidnapped in the Shi'ite eastern suburb of Sadr City, where they had been working on the construction of a football stadium.
Security forces launched searches for the abductees across eastern Baghdad, police said.
